rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: spacious entrance with a waiting area and coat closet. Natural light from large windows.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: open space with sliding glass doors to the garden for natural ventilation and light

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: adjacent to living room, designed for informal dining with access to kitchen.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: quiet bedroom on the ground floor with a private balcony and ample windows for natural light

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: secondary bedroom with its own closet and sufficient ventilation from north-facing window

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: versatile room designed for work or study, features natural light.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: storage, laundry area and additional space for appliances

openings.location: multiple windows in living room, bedrooms and study area

rooms.name: Open Terrace
rooms.description: extended living area with garden view, designed for social gatherings and relaxation.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: additional bedroom with ample ventilation and a focus on east-facing windows to encourage positivity according to Vastu

rooms.name: Kids Play Area/Workspace
rooms.description: dedicated area for children or home office space, featuring large openings for fresh air

openings.location: connecting ground floor and first floor

rooms.name: Studio/Convertible Loft
rooms.description: multifunctional space that can serve as a guest suite or home office; designed with ample natural light and ventilation. Features large windows facing south for warmth and energy.

rooms.name: Storage Loft
rooms.description: additional storage area integrated within the attic design

openings.location: connecting first floor and second floor
large windows on south facade for natural light
